1.Title: Palmful of Cilantro
1.Description: When Alice triggers a <color=#F0D12B>Polarity Assault</color>, she gains 25 <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color>. When she triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> against an enemy, the target's DEF is reduced by 20% for 30s.
1.Lore:
A sprig of coriander sways like a newborn green star,
So fragile her fingertips felt they might pass through it.
She slowly opened her trembling hands,
And held that flicker of feeling in her palms.
Her heart beat like a spring bud breaking the earth at dawn, just after the rain.

2.Title: Sage at the Sword's Tip
2.Description: When <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Starfall Finale</color>'s Finishing Move hits an enemy, it triggers <color=#F0D12B>Polarity Assault</color>. All squad members' <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG increases by 15%. <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> DMG against enemies suffering from <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</color> increases by 15%. Upon entering the battlefield, Alice immediately gains 1,000 Decibels. Triggers once per 180s in Investigation Zone mode.
2.Lore:
The silver blade dips low, kissing the frost-lined sage leaf.
This pre-battle salute is the girl's quiet show of composure.
Fear and helplessness lie frozen in the faded dreams of yesterday.
Her sword stirs, ready to trace the outline of the stars.
Dawn is near, and the flower bud waits to bloom.

3.Title: Symmetrism
3.Lore:
She couldn't resist perfect symmetry.
In symmetry, there was order, balance, and meaning. Without it, her bunny ears and tail would dull and droop, as if something lovely were about to vanish from her world.
"So... that's why you had to bring up my mismatched socks, and tried to take off my leg band?"
"I just can't stand your asymmetry! Just for a second, I swear — just one second!"

4.Title: Rosemary on Her Lips
4.Description: Alice ignores 10% of the target's <color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</color>. Enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Celestial Overture</color> accumulates 25% more <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup</color>.
4.Lore:
The scent of rosemary lingered between her lips,
A vow searing and resolute, carried on every breath of frost.
Even as the air in her lungs turned cold and heavy,
The girl would never forget the spell called love.
"In the name of the Thymefields... I will never betray it."

5.Title: Passion for the Supernatural
5.Lore:
She couldn't resist scary paranormal things.
Within the paranormal hid the unknown and the dangerous. When she felt it, her bunny ears and tail would bristle in fright — only to become irresistibly smooth once she calmed down.
"So... that's why you always tag along on my ghost-hunting trips, even though you're scared out of your mind?"
"I just wanted to see what would happen... but it's so scary, I totally regret it! Just this once — I swear I'm not coming next time!"

6.Title: A Heart of Thyme
6.Description: When Alice uses a third-stage charged <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Starshine Waltz</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Starfall Finale</color>, she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Victory State</color> for 30s. During this time, whenever any squad member lands a hit on a target, Alice will follow up with an extra attack against the target, dealing Physical DMG equal to 3,300% of her Anomaly Proficiency. This effect can trigger once every 1s and is guaranteed to CRIT. This effect can trigger up to 6 times. Gaining the <color=#FFFFFF>Victory State</color> again refreshes the available trigger count.
6.Lore:
The thyme-scented manor,
The night spent watching the stars,
The moment she came to understand what courage truly meant.
A fragrant wind swept the clouds away, and sunlight outshone the crystal chandelier.
The girl gave a gentle bow to the days gone by.
Then, slowly, she vanished into the field of thyme.

UniqueSkill.Title: Core Passive: Twin Rainbows of the Swordheart

DescriptionByLevel.1:
After any squad member inflicts a <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</color> on an enemy, Alice deals additional DMG each 0.95s of its active duration, equal to 2.5% of the original Physical Anomaly DMG. If <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> is triggered while the enemy is suffering a <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</color>, for every 1s of remaining <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly</color> duration, the <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color> DMG multiplier increases by 18%, up to a max of {CAL:18*10,1,2}%.
When Alice's attacks hit an enemy, she builds up <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color>. When she triggers an <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> through Anomaly Buildup, she gains 10 <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color>. <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color> has a maximum of 300, with each 100 being 1 bar.
When the Finishing Move of a three-stage charged <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Starshine Waltz</color> lands, it triggers a special <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> effect: <color=#F0D12B>Polarity Assault</color>, dealing {CAL:0+100,1,2}% of the original <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> DMG, ignoring Anomaly Buildup progress. This can be combined with any Attribute Anomaly, including Physical Anomaly, to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>.
When Alice triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy, her <color=#F0D12B>Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>12.5%</color> for 30s.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Mystery Hunt
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character:
When any squad member triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>, Alice gains 30 <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color>.
If Alice's Anomaly Mastery exceeds 140, each additional point grants her 1.6 Anomaly Proficiency.
Upon entering the battlefield, Alice gains 300 <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color>. This effect can trigger once every 180s in Investigation Zone mode.

140100001.Title: Basic Attack: Celestial Overture
140100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Perform up to 5 slashes forward, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When Alice triggers <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> through Attribute Anomaly Buildup, the 5th hit of her next <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> is enhanced.

140100002.Title: Basic Attack: Starshine Waltz
140100002.Description:
When Alice's <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color> reaches 1 bar, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Hold to charge, expending up to 3 bars of <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color>. Release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> or when <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color> is below 1 bar, Alice performs a series of slashes in an area centered on the target enemy, with the number of hits determined by charge level, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
When the Finishing Move of a three-stage charged <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Starshine Waltz</color> hits, it triggers a special <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> effect: <color=#F0D12B>Polarity Assault</color>. This deals DMG equal to {CAL:0+100,1,2}% of the original <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color>, ignoring Anomaly Buildup, and can interact with other Attribute Anomalies, including Physical, to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color> does not accumulate when hitting an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100003.Title: Special Attack: Piercing Dawn
140100003.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Hurl the blade to strike and pass through enemies ahead, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> can be triggered.
After triggering a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to follow up with the 5th hit of a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100004.Title: EX Special Attack: Aurora Thrust - Northern Cross
140100004.Description:
With enough energy, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} forward and press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
A thrust attack that goes through enemies ahead, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Activating the skill can trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> and restores 10 <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100005.Title: EX Special Attack: Aurora Thrust - Southern Cross
140100005.Description:
With enough energy, and without moving the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} or when dragging it backwards, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Back away with a slash, then thrust forward, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Activating the skill can trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> and restores 10 <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100038.Title: EX Special Attack: Aurora Thrust - Northern Cross

140100042.Title: EX Special Attack: Aurora Thrust - Southern Cross

140100006.Title: Dodge: Jumpy Bunny
140100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100007.Title: Dash Attack: Blade-Dancer's Gale
140100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

140100008.Title: Dodge Counter: Ceremony of Swordlight
140100008.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slash and kick enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100009.Title: Chain Attack: Starfall Intermission
140100009.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes powerful consecutive slashes at enemies ahead, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100010.Title: Ultimate: Starfall Finale
140100010.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies in a large area ahead, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Activating this skill restores 200 <color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color>.
<color=#FFFFFF>Blade Etiquette</color> does not accumulate when hitting an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100012.Title: Quick Assist: Intertwined Stab
140100012.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slash and kick enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100013.Title: Defensive Assist: Parry Guard
140100013.Description:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

140100014.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Cross Riposte
140100014.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge forward and slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
